overview: This documentary interviews the son of a former chief minister, who was a member of ex-Prime Minister Saddam Hussein's inner circle. It also has interviews British politicians about their thought of the Iraq War. Lasting from 2003 to 2011, The Second Persian Gulf War, also known as the Iraq War, was a largely U.S.-British invasion of Iraq, on the pretext that dictator Saddam Hussein was building weapons of mass destruction.
title: Life After War : Iraq
